Class TemplateComponent

java.lang.Object
io.mindspice.simplypages.core.TemplateComponent
All Implemented Interfaces:
Component
public class TemplateComponent extends Object implements Component
Adapter class that wraps a Template and a RenderContext to make them usable as a standard Component.

This component is crucial for the "Composite Pattern" of rendering, allowing high-performance, pre-compiled templates to be mixed seamlessly into request-scoped component trees.

Use Case

  • Embedding a highly dynamic module (Pattern B) into a conditional page layout (Pattern A).
  • Creating lists or grids of templates where the layout is built at runtime.

    • render

      public String render(RenderContext parentContext)
      Description copied from interface: Component
      Renders this component to an HTML string using the provided context.

      This method is responsible for generating the complete HTML representation of the component, including all nested children and attributes, resolving any dynamic slots from the context.

      Specified by:
      render in interface Component
      Parameters:
      parentContext - the context containing values for dynamic slots
      Returns:
      HTML string representation of this component
